scripts.build: rimraf src/_lib && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && bun scripts/postbuild.ts
scripts.prepare: bun run prepare:client && bun run prepare:server
scripts.prepare:server: bun --cwd src vite build --ssr app/index.server.tsx --outDir dist/server
scripts.serve: bun run prepare && NODE_ENV=production bun --cwd src scripts/createServer.ts
